Docs.summary: Base type for all platform-specific attributes. Primarily used to allow grouping in documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string platformName) cil managed

Docs.param: The platform name to which the atribute applies, can have optional version.
Docs.summary: When applied to an API it means the API is supporeted fro the platform passed by platformName attribute, if version provided the API cannot be called from an earlier versions. The attribute can be applied multiple times for different operating systems.
